mapper.insert: insert into lms_classPlaylist (title, description, classID, playlistID, week, day, daySeq, startDate, endDate) values (#{title}, #{description}, #{classID}, #{playlistID}, #{week}, #{day}, #{daySeq}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
mapper.select: select count(*) from lms_classPlaylist where classID=#{classID} and week=#{week} and day=#{day}
select * from lms_classPlaylist where classID=#{classID} order by week and day and daySeq
